Rules.Label: [BS2] Assets = LiabilitiesAndEquity
Rules.Description: Rule to validate Assets (fac:Assets). It also creates a new fact (fac:AssetsValidation) that contains the validation result.
Rules.Formula:
for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal((
      "fac:AssetsValidation", "fac:Assets", "fac:LiabilitiesAndEquity"
    ), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options)
let $aligned-period := ( facts:duration-for-fact($facts).End, facts:instant-for-fact($facts), "forever")[1]
group by $canonical-filter-string := 
  facts:canonically-serialize-object($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, "_id", "IsInDefaultHypercube", "Type", "Value", "Decimals", "AuditTrails", "xbrl28:Type", "Balance", $facts:PERIOD))
  , $aligned-period
let $AssetsValidation as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:AssetsValidation"]
let $Assets as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:Assets"]
let $LiabilitiesAndEquity as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:LiabilitiesAndEquity"]
let $_unit := ($facts.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)[1]
return
  switch (true)
  case exists($AssetsValidation) return $AssetsValidation
  case (exists($Assets) and true)
  return
    let $computed-value := rules:decimal-value($Assets) eq rules:decimal-value($LiabilitiesAndEquity)
    let $audit-trail-message := 
         rules:fact-trail($Assets, "Assets") || " = " || rules:fact-trail($LiabilitiesAndEquity, "LiabilitiesAndEquity")
  let $source-facts := ($AssetsValidation, $Assets, $LiabilitiesAndEquity)
    return
      if(string(number($computed-value)) != "NaN" and not($computed-value instance of xs:boolean) and $computed-value ne xs:integer($computed-value))
      then
        copy $newfact :=
          rules:create-computed-fact(
            $Assets,
            "fac:AssetsValidation",
            $computed-value,
            $rule,
            $audit-trail-message,
            $source-facts,
            $options)
        modify (
            replace value of json $newfact("Decimals") with 2
          )
        return $newfact
      else
        rules:create-computed-fact(
          $Assets,
          "fac:AssetsValidation",
          $computed-value,
          $rule,
          $audit-trail-message,
          $source-facts,
            $options,
            $Assets,
            $computed-value)
  default return ()

Rules.Label: [BS3] Assets = CurrentAssets + NoncurrentAssets
Rules.Description: Rule to validate Assets (fac:Assets). It also creates a new fact (fac:AssetsValidation2) that contains the validation result.
Rules.Formula:
for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal((
      "fac:AssetsValidation2", "fac:Assets", "fac:CurrentAssets", "fac:NoncurrentAssets"
    ), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options)
let $aligned-period := ( facts:duration-for-fact($facts).End, facts:instant-for-fact($facts), "forever")[1]
group by $canonical-filter-string := 
  facts:canonically-serialize-object($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, "_id", "IsInDefaultHypercube", "Type", "Value", "Decimals", "AuditTrails", "xbrl28:Type", "Balance", $facts:PERIOD))
  , $aligned-period
let $AssetsValidation2 as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:AssetsValidation2"]
let $Assets as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:Assets"]
let $CurrentAssets as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:CurrentAssets"]
let $NoncurrentAssets as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:NoncurrentAssets"]
let $_unit := ($facts.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)[1]
return
  switch (true)
  case exists($AssetsValidation2) return $AssetsValidation2
  case (exists($Assets) and true)
  return
    let $computed-value := rules:decimal-value($Assets) eq rules:decimal-value($CurrentAssets) + rules:decimal-value($NoncurrentAssets)
    let $audit-trail-message := 
         rules:fact-trail($Assets, "Assets") || " = " || rules:fact-trail($CurrentAssets, "CurrentAssets") || " + " || rules:fact-trail($NoncurrentAssets, "NoncurrentAssets")
  let $source-facts := ($AssetsValidation2, $Assets, $CurrentAssets, $NoncurrentAssets)
    return
      if(string(number($computed-value)) != "NaN" and not($computed-value instance of xs:boolean) and $computed-value ne xs:integer($computed-value))
      then
        copy $newfact :=
          rules:create-computed-fact(
            $Assets,
            "fac:AssetsValidation2",
            $computed-value,
            $rule,
            $audit-trail-message,
            $source-facts,
            $options)
        modify (
            replace value of json $newfact("Decimals") with 2
          )
        return $newfact
      else
        rules:create-computed-fact(
          $Assets,
          "fac:AssetsValidation2",
          $computed-value,
          $rule,
          $audit-trail-message,
          $source-facts,
            $options,
            $Assets,
            $computed-value)
  default return ()

Rules.Label: Balance Sheet Format imputation
Rules.Formula: for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal(( "fac:BalanceSheetFormat", "fac:DocumentType", "fac:CurrentAssets", "fac:NoncurrentAssets", "fac:NoncurrentLiabilities", "fac:CurrentLiabilities"), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options) let $aligned-period := ( facts:duration-for-fact($facts).End, facts:instant-for-fact($facts), "forever")[1] group by $canonical-filter-string := facts:canonically-serialize-object($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, "_id", "IsInDefaultHypercube", "Type", "Value", "Decimals", "AuditTrails", "xbrl28:Type", $facts:PERIOD, $facts:UNIT, "Balance")), $aligned-period let $BalanceSheetFormat as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:BalanceSheetFormat"] let $DocumentType as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:DocumentType"] let $CurrentAssets as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:CurrentAssets"] let $NoncurrentAssets as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:NoncurrentAssets"] let $NoncurrentLiabilities as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:NoncurrentLiabilities"] let $CurrentLiabilities as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:CurrentLiabilities"] return switch (true) case exists($BalanceSheetFormat) return $BalanceSheetFormat case(exists($DocumentType)) return let $computed-value := if (rules:decimal-value($CurrentAssets) eq 0 and rules:decimal-value($NoncurrentAssets) eq 0 and rules:decimal-value($NoncurrentLiabilities) eq 0 and rules:decimal-value($CurrentLiabilities) eq 0) then "Unclassified" else "Classified" let $audit-trail-message := rules:fact-trail({ "Aspects" : { "xbrl:Concept" : "fac:BalanceSheetFormat" }, Value: $computed-value , Type: "NonNumericValue" }) || " = " || $computed-value || " (because " || rules:fact-trail($CurrentAssets, "fac:CurrentAssets") || ", " || rules:fact-trail($NoncurrentAssets, "fac:NoncurrentAssets") || ", " || rules:fact-trail($NoncurrentLiabilities, "fac:NoncurrentLiabilities") || ", " || rules:fact-trail($CurrentLiabilities, "fac:CurrentLiabilities") || ")" let $source-facts := ( $CurrentAssets, $NoncurrentAssets, $NoncurrentLiabilities, $CurrentLiabilities) return copy $newfact := rules:create-computed-fact( ($DocumentType, $source-facts)[1], "fac:BalanceSheetFormat", $computed-value, $rule, $audit-trail-message, $source-facts, $options) modify ( replace value of json $newfact("Type") with "NonNumericValue" ) return $newfact default return ()

Rules.Label: Comprehensive Income (Loss)
Rules.Description: Rule to compute Comprehensive Income (Loss) (fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss).
Rules.Formula:
for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal((
      "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss", "fac:NetIncomeLoss", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest", "fac:OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss"
    ), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options)
let $aligned-period := ( facts:duration-for-fact($facts).End, facts:instant-for-fact($facts), "forever")[1]
group by $canonical-filter-string := 
  facts:canonically-serialize-object($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, "_id", "IsInDefaultHypercube", "Type", "Value", "Decimals", "AuditTrails", "xbrl28:Type", "Balance", $facts:PERIOD))
  , $aligned-period
let $ComprehensiveIncomeLoss as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss"]
let $NetIncomeLoss as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:NetIncomeLoss"]
let $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent"]
let $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest"]
let $OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss"]
let $_unit := ($facts.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)[1]
return
  switch (true)
  case exists($ComprehensiveIncomeLoss) return $ComprehensiveIncomeLoss
  case (exists($NetIncomeLoss) and (not((not(exists($NetIncomeLoss)))) and not((not(exists($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent)))) and (rules:decimal-value($NetIncomeLoss) - rules:decimal-value($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent) eq 0) and (rules:decimal-value($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest) eq 0) and (rules:decimal-value($OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss) eq 0)))
  return
    let $computed-value := rules:decimal-value($NetIncomeLoss)
    let $audit-trail-message := 
      rules:fact-trail({"Aspects": { "xbrl:Unit" : $_unit, "xbrl:Concept" : "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss" }, Value: $computed-value }) || " = " || 
         rules:fact-trail($NetIncomeLoss, "NetIncomeLoss")
  let $source-facts := ($ComprehensiveIncomeLoss, $NetIncomeLoss, $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent, $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest, $OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss)
    return
      if(string(number($computed-value)) != "NaN" and not($computed-value instance of xs:boolean) and $computed-value ne xs:integer($computed-value))
      then
        copy $newfact :=
          rules:create-computed-fact(
            $NetIncomeLoss,
            "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss",
            $computed-value,
            $rule,
            $audit-trail-message,
            $source-facts,
            $options)
        modify (
            replace value of json $newfact("Decimals") with 2
          )
        return $newfact
      else
        rules:create-computed-fact(
          $NetIncomeLoss,
          "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss",
          $computed-value,
          $rule,
          $audit-trail-message,
          $source-facts,
            $options)
  default return ()

Rules.Label: Comprehensive Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
Rules.Description: Rule to compute Comprehensive Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent (fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent).
Rules.Formula:
for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal((
      "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest", "fac:IncomeLossBeforeEquityMethodInvestments", "fac:NetIncomeLoss"
    ), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options)
let $aligned-period := ( facts:duration-for-fact($facts).End, facts:instant-for-fact($facts), "forever")[1]
group by $canonical-filter-string := 
  facts:canonically-serialize-object($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, "_id", "IsInDefaultHypercube", "Type", "Value", "Decimals", "AuditTrails", "xbrl28:Type", "Balance", $facts:PERIOD))
  , $aligned-period
let $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent"]
let $ComprehensiveIncomeLoss as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss"]
let $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest"]
let $IncomeLossBeforeEquityMethodInvestments as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:IncomeLossBeforeEquityMethodInvestments"]
let $NetIncomeLoss as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:NetIncomeLoss"]
let $_unit := ($facts.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)[1]
return
  switch (true)
  case exists($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent) return $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent
  case (exists($ComprehensiveIncomeLoss) and (not((not(exists($ComprehensiveIncomeLoss)))) and not(exists($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest))))
  return
    let $computed-value := rules:decimal-value($ComprehensiveIncomeLoss)
    let $audit-trail-message := 
      rules:fact-trail({"Aspects": { "xbrl:Unit" : $_unit, "xbrl:Concept" : "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent" }, Value: $computed-value }) || " = " || 
         rules:fact-trail($ComprehensiveIncomeLoss, "ComprehensiveIncomeLoss")
  let $source-facts := ($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent, $ComprehensiveIncomeLoss, $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest, $IncomeLossBeforeEquityMethodInvestments, $NetIncomeLoss)
    return
      if(string(number($computed-value)) != "NaN" and not($computed-value instance of xs:boolean) and $computed-value ne xs:integer($computed-value))
      then
        copy $newfact :=
          rules:create-computed-fact(
            $ComprehensiveIncomeLoss,
            "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent",
            $computed-value,
            $rule,
            $audit-trail-message,
            $source-facts,
            $options)
        modify (
            replace value of json $newfact("Decimals") with 2
          )
        return $newfact
      else
        rules:create-computed-fact(
          $ComprehensiveIncomeLoss,
          "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent",
          $computed-value,
          $rule,
          $audit-trail-message,
          $source-facts,
            $options)
  case (exists($ComprehensiveIncomeLoss) and (not(exists($ComprehensiveIncomeLoss)) and not(exists($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest)) and not(exists($IncomeLossBeforeEquityMethodInvestments)) and not((not(exists($NetIncomeLoss))))))
  return
    let $computed-value := rules:decimal-value($NetIncomeLoss)
    let $audit-trail-message := 
      rules:fact-trail({"Aspects": { "xbrl:Unit" : $_unit, "xbrl:Concept" : "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent" }, Value: $computed-value }) || " = " || 
         rules:fact-trail($NetIncomeLoss, "NetIncomeLoss")
  let $source-facts := ($ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent, $ComprehensiveIncomeLoss, $ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest, $IncomeLossBeforeEquityMethodInvestments, $NetIncomeLoss)
    return
      if(string(number($computed-value)) != "NaN" and not($computed-value instance of xs:boolean) and $computed-value ne xs:integer($computed-value))
      then
        copy $newfact :=
          rules:create-computed-fact(
            $ComprehensiveIncomeLoss,
            "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent",
            $computed-value,
            $rule,
            $audit-trail-message,
            $source-facts,

  , $aligned-period

  case (exists($NetIncomeLoss) and true)
  return

    return

            $computed-value,
            $rule,
            $audit-trail-message,
            $source-facts,

($facts:CONCEPT, "_id", "IsInDefaultHypercube", "Type", "Value", "Decimals", "AuditTrails", "xbrl28:Type", $facts:PERIOD, "Balance")), $aligned-period return let $passed as object* := $facts[$$.Value eq true] let $failed as object* := $facts[$$.Value eq false] let $not-applied as string* := distinct-values($validations)[not($$ = $facts.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT)] for $concept in flatten($aligned-filter.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT) return switch ($concept) case "fac:PassedValidations" return let $computed-value := count($passed) let $audit-trail-message := "count(" || string-join($passed.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT, ", ") || ")" let $source-facts := ($passed) return copy $new := rules:create-computed-fact( ($facts[exists(facts:duration-for-fact($$))],$facts)[1], "fac:PassedValidations", $computed-value, {Label: $rule.Label || ": Passed Validations", Type: "xbrl28:formula" }, $audit-trail-message, $source-facts, $options) modify ( if(exists($new.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)) then replace value of json $new.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT with "pure" else insert json {$facts:UNIT : "pure"} into $new.$facts:ASPECTS, if(exists($new.Type)) then replace value of json $new.Type with "NumericValue" else insert json { Type : "NumericValue"} into $new, if(exists($new.Decimals)) then replace value of json $new.Decimals with 0 else insert json { Decimals : 0} into $new ) return $new case "fac:FailedValidations" return let $computed-value := count($failed) let $audit-trail-message := "count(" || string-join($failed.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT, ", ") || ")" let $source-facts := ($failed) return copy $new := rules:create-computed-fact( ($facts[exists(facts:duration-for-fact($$))],$facts)[1], "fac:FailedValidations", $computed-value, {Label: $rule.Label || ": Passed Validations", Type: "xbrl28:formula" }, $audit-trail-message, $source-facts, $options) modify ( if(exists($new.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)) then replace value of json $new.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT with "pure" else insert json {$facts:UNIT : "pure"} into $new.$facts:ASPECTS, if(exists($new.Type)) then replace value of json $new.Type with "NumericValue" else insert json { Type : "NumericValue"} into $new, if(exists($new.Decimals)) then replace value of json $new.Decimals with 0 else insert json { Decimals : 0} into $new ) return $new case "fac:NotApplicableValidations" return let $computed-value := count($not-applied) let $audit-trail-message := "count(" || string-join($not-applied, ", ") || ")" let $source-facts := () return copy $new := rules:create-computed-fact( ($facts[exists(facts:duration-for-fact($$))],$facts)[1], "fac:NotApplicableValidations", $computed-value, {Label: $rule.Label || ": Validations that couldn't be applied", Type: "xbrl28:formula" }, $audit-trail-message, $source-facts, $options) modify ( if(exists($new.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)) then replace value of json $new.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT with "pure" else insert json {$facts:UNIT : "pure"} into $new.$facts:ASPECTS, if(exists($new.Type)) then replace value of json $new.Type with "NumericValue" else insert json { Type : "NumericValue"} into $new, if(exists($new.Decimals)) then replace value of json $new.Decimals with 0 else insert json { Decimals : 0} into $new ) return $new default return ()

Rules.Label: Sustainable Growth Rate (SGR)
Rules.Description: Rule to compute Sustainable Growth Rate (SGR) (fac:SustainableGrowthRate).
Rules.Formula:
for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal((
      "fac:SustainableGrowthRate", "fac:Equity", "fac:Assets", "fac:Revenues", "fac:NetIncomeLoss"
    ), $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options)
let $aligned-period := ( facts:duration-for-fact($facts).End, facts:instant-for-fact($facts), "forever")[1]
group by $canonical-filter-string := 
  facts:canonically-serialize-object($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, "_id", "IsInDefaultHypercube", "Type", "Value", "Decimals", "AuditTrails", "xbrl28:Type", "Balance", $facts:PERIOD))
  , $aligned-period
let $SustainableGrowthRate as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:SustainableGrowthRate"]
let $Equity as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:Equity"]
let $Assets as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:Assets"]
let $Revenues as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:Revenues"]
let $NetIncomeLoss as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq "fac:NetIncomeLoss"]
let $_unit := ($facts.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:UNIT)[1]
return
  switch (true)
  case exists($SustainableGrowthRate) return $SustainableGrowthRate
  case (exists($NetIncomeLoss) and (rules:decimal-value($Equity) ne 0 and rules:decimal-value($Assets) ne 0 and rules:decimal-value($Revenues) ne 0 and rules:decimal-value($NetIncomeLoss) ne 0))
  return
    let $computed-value := ((rules:decimal-value($NetIncomeLoss) div rules:decimal-value($Revenues)) * (1 + (rules:decimal-value($Assets) - rules:decimal-value($Equity)) div rules:decimal-value($Equity))) div ((1 div (rules:decimal-value($Revenues) div rules:decimal-value($Assets))) - ((rules:decimal-value($NetIncomeLoss) div rules:decimal-value($Revenues)) * (1 + (rules:decimal-value($Assets) - rules:decimal-value($Equity)) div rules:decimal-value($Equity))))
    let $audit-trail-message := 
      rules:fact-trail({"Aspects": { "xbrl:Unit" : $_unit, "xbrl:Concept" : "fac:SustainableGrowthRate" }, Value: $computed-value }) || " = " || 
         " ( " || " ( " || rules:fact-trail($NetIncomeLoss, "NetIncomeLoss") || " div " || rules:fact-trail($Revenues, "Revenues") || " )" || " * " || " ( " || "1" || " + " || " ( " || rules:fact-trail($Assets, "Assets") || " - " || rules:fact-trail($Equity, "Equity") || " )" || " div " || rules:fact-trail($Equity, "Equity") || " )" || " )" || " div " || " ( " || " ( " || "1" || " div " || " ( " || rules:fact-trail($Revenues, "Revenues") || " div " || rules:fact-trail($Assets, "Assets") || " )" || " )" || " - " || " ( " || " ( " || rules:fact-trail($NetIncomeLoss, "NetIncomeLoss") || " div " || rules:fact-trail($Revenues, "Revenues") || " )" || " * " || " ( " || "1" || " + " || " ( " || rules:fact-trail($Assets, "Assets") || " - " || rules:fact-trail($Equity, "Equity") || " )" || " div " || rules:fact-trail($Equity, "Equity") || " )" || " )" || " )"
  let $source-facts := ($SustainableGrowthRate, $Equity, $Assets, $Revenues, $NetIncomeLoss)
    return
      if(string(number($computed-value)) != "NaN" and not($computed-value instance of xs:boolean) and $computed-value ne xs:integer($computed-value))
      then
        copy $newfact :=
          rules:create-computed-fact(
            $NetIncomeLoss,
            "fac:SustainableGrowthRate",
            $computed-value,
            $rule,
            $audit-trail-message,
            $source-facts,
            $options)
        modify (
            replace value of json $newfact("Decimals") with 2
          )
        return $newfact
      else
        rules:create-computed-fact(
          $NetIncomeLoss,
          "fac:SustainableGrowthRate",
          $computed-value,
          $rule,
          $audit-trail-message,
          $source-facts,
            $options)
  default return ()

Formulae.BodySrc:
(( NetIncomeLoss / Revenues ) * (1 + ( Assets - Equity ) / Equity ))
  / (( 1 / ( Revenues / Assets )) - (( NetIncomeLoss / Revenues ) * (1 + ( Assets - Equity ) /Equity )))

if($concept = ("oag:SalesVolumesTotal", "oag:SalesVolumesDailyTotal")) then () else local:mapToMember($concept) let $hypercube-mod := { "Name" : "us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis", "Default" : "us-gaap:TypeOfReserveDomain" } let $aligned-filter := copy $f := $aligned-filter modify ( if(exists($filter-mod)) then if(exists($f.Aspects."us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis")) then replace value of json $f.Aspects."us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis" with $filter-mod else insert json { "us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis": [ $filter-mod ] } into $f.Aspects else (), replace value of json $f.Aspects.$facts:CONCEPT with [ $target-concept ] ) return $f let $hypercube := copy $h := $hypercube modify ( if(exists($h.Aspects."us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis")) then replace value of json $h.Aspects."us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis" with $hypercube-mod else insert json {"us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis" : $hypercube-mod } into $h.Aspects ) return $h return for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal( $target-concept, $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options) group by $canonical-filter-string := facts:canonically-serialize-object($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, "_id", "IsInDefaultHypercube", "Type", "Value", "Decimals", "AuditTrails", "xbrl28:Type", "Balance")) return let $member := local:mapToMember($concept) for $salesVolume in $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS."us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis" eq $member] return let $source-fact := $salesVolume let $value := local:valueAdjusted($concept, $salesVolume) let $unit := local:unitsAdjusted($concept, $salesVolume) let $original-concept := $salesVolume.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT let $audit-trail-message := "concept to member mapping: '" || $concept || "' -> '" || $original-concept || "(us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis::" || $member || ")'" return copy $f := rules:create-computed-fact( $source-fact, $concept, $value, $rule, $audit-trail-message, $source-fact, $options) modify ( if(exists($f.Aspects."us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis")) then delete json $f.Aspects."us-gaap:ReserveQuantitiesByTypeOfReserveAxis" else (), replace value of json $f.Aspects."xbrl:Unit" with $unit ) return $f

Rules.Label: Zeros instead of null
Rules.Formula:
import module namespace r = "http://zorba.io/modules/random";

let $concepts-in-report := ("fac:Assets", "fac:AssetsValidation", "fac:AssetsValidation2", "fac:BalanceSheetDate", "fac:BalanceSheetFormat", "fac:BalanceSheetHierarchy", "fac:CashFlowStatementHierarchy", "fac:CommitmentsAndContingencies", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLoss", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossAttributableToParent", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossValidation", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossValidation2", "fac:CostOfRevenue", "fac:CostsAndExpenses", "fac:CurrentAssets", "fac:CurrentLiabilities", "fac:DocumentType", "fac:EntityCentralIndexKey", "fac:EntityFilerCategory", "fac:EntityRegistrantName", "fac:Equity", "fac:EquityAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest", "fac:EquityAttributableToParent", "fac:EquityValidation", "fac:ExchangeGainsLosses", "fac:ExtraordinaryItemsOfIncomeExpenseNetOfTax", "fac:FailedValidations", "fac:FiscalPeriod", "fac:FiscalYear", "fac:FiscalYearEnd", "fac:FundamentalAccountingConceptsHierarchy", "fac:FundamentalAccountingConceptsLineItems", "fac:GeneralInformationHierarchy", "fac:GrossProfit", "fac:GrossProfitValidation", "fac:IncomeLossBeforeEquityMethodInvestments", "fac:IncomeLossBeforeEquityMethodInvestmentsValidation", "fac:IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAfterTax", "fac:IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAfterTaxValidation", "fac:IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeTax", "fac:IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeTaxValidation", "fac:IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetOfTax", "fac:IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments", "fac:IncomeStatementFormat", "fac:IncomeStatementHierarchy", "fac:IncomeStatementStartPeriodYearToDate", "fac:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit", "fac:InterestAndDebtExpense", "fac:KeyRatiosHierarchy", "fac:Liabilities", "fac:LiabilitiesAndEquity", "fac:LiabilitiesAndEquityValidation", "fac:LiabilitiesValidation", "fac:NatureOfOperations", "fac:NetCashFlow", "fac:NetCashFlowContinuing", "fac:NetCashFlowContinuingValidation", "fac:NetCashFlowDiscontinued", "fac:NetCashFlowDiscontinuedValidation", "fac:NetCashFlowFromFinancingActivities", "fac:NetCashFlowFromFinancingActivitiesContinuing", "fac:NetCashFlowFromFinancingActivitiesDiscontinued", "fac:NetCashFlowFromFinancingActivitiesValidation", "fac:NetCashFlowFromInvestingActivities", "fac:NetCashFlowFromInvestingActivitiesContinuing", "fac:NetCashFlowFromInvestingActivitiesDiscontinued", "fac:NetCashFlowFromInvestingActivitiesValidation", "fac:NetCashFlowFromOperatingActivities", "fac:NetCashFlowFromOperatingActivitiesContinuing", "fac:NetCashFlowFromOperatingActivitiesDiscontinued", "fac:NetCashFlowFromOperatingActivitiesValidation", "fac:NetCashFlowValidation", "fac:NetIncomeLoss", "fac:NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest", "fac:NetIncomeLossAttributableToParent", "fac:NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholdersBasic", "fac:NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholdersBasicValidation", "fac:NetIncomeLossValidation", "fac:NetIncomeLossValidation2", "fac:NoncurrentAssets", "fac:NoncurrentLiabilities", "fac:NonoperatingIncomeLoss", "fac:NonoperatingIncomeLossPlusInterestAndDebtExpense", "fac:NonoperatingIncomePlusInterestAndDebtExpensePlusIncomeFromEquityMethodInvestments", "fac:NotApplicableValidations", "fac:OperatingExpenses", "fac:OperatingIncomeLoss", "fac:OperatingIncomeLossValidation", "fac:OperatingIncomeLossValidation2", "fac:OtherComprehensiveIncomeLoss", "fac:OtherOperatingIncomeExpenses", "fac:PassedValidations", "fac:PreferredStockDividendsAndOtherAdjustments", "fac:RedeemableNoncontrollingInterest", "fac:ResearchAndDevelopment", "fac:ReturnOnAssets", "fac:ReturnOnEquity", "fac:ReturnOnSales", "fac:Revenues", "fac:StatementComprehensiveIncomeHierarchy", "fac:SustainableGrowthRate", "fac:TemporaryEquity", "fac:TradingSymbol", "fac:ValidationStatistics", "fac:Validations")
let $non-numeric-concepts := ("fac:FiscalPeriod", "fac:EntityRegistrantName", "fac:EntityCentralIndexKey", "fac:EntityFilerCategory",
                            "fac:TradingSymbol", "fac:FiscalYearEnd", "fac:FiscalYear", "fac:FiscalPeriod", "fac:DocumentType",
                            "fac:BalanceSheetDate", "fac:IncomeStatementStartPeriodYearToDate", "fac:BalanceSheetFormat",
                            "fac:IncomeStatementFormat", "fac:NatureOfOperations", "fac:EquityValidation",
                            "fac:AssetsValidation2", "fac:LiabilitiesValidation", "fac:LiabilitiesAndEquityValidation",
                            "fac:GrossProfitValidation", "fac:OperatingIncomeLossValidation",
                            "fac:IncomeLossBeforeEquityMethodInvestmentsValidation", "fac:IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAfterTaxValidation",
                            "fac:NetIncomeLossValidation", "fac:NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholdersBasicValidation",
                            "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossValidation", "fac:ComprehensiveIncomeLossValidation2",
                            "fac:OperatingIncomeLossValidation2", "fac:NetCashFlowValidation", "fac:NetCashFlowContinuingValidation",
                            "fac:NetCashFlowDiscontinuedValidation", "fac:NetCashFlowFromOperatingActivitiesValidation",
                            "fac:NetCashFlowFromInvestingActivitiesValidation", "fac:IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBeforeTaxValidation",
                            "fac:NetCashFlowFromFinancingActivitiesValidation", "fac:NetIncomeLossValidation2", "fac:AssetsValidation" )
let $abstract-concepts := ("fac:ValidationStatistics", "fac:Validations", "xbrl:ConceptDomain", "fac:FundamentalAccountingConceptsLineItems",
                           "fac:FundamentalAccountingConceptsHierarchy", "fac:GeneralInformationHierarchy", "fac:BalanceSheetHierarchy", 
						   "fac:IncomeStatementHierarchy", "fac:StatementComprehensiveIncomeHierarchy", "fac:CashFlowStatementHierarchy", 
						   "fac:KeyRatiosHierarchy")
let $numeric-concepts := $concepts[not($$ = $non-numeric-concepts) and not($$ = $abstract-concepts) and $$ = $concepts-in-report]
let $numeric-instant-concepts := ("fac:CurrentAssets", "fac:NoncurrentAssets", "fac:Assets", "fac:CurrentLiabilities",
                         "fac:NoncurrentLiabilities", "fac:Liabilities", "fac:CommitmentsAndContingencies", "fac:TemporaryEquity",
                         "fac:RedeemableNoncontrollingInterest", "fac:EquityAttributableToParent",
                         "fac:EquityAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest", "fac:Equity", "fac:LiabilitiesAndEquity", "fac:CommonStockSharesAuthorized", "fac:CommonStockSharesIssued", "fac:CommonStockSharesOutstanding")
let $numeric-duration-concepts := $numeric-concepts[not($$ = $numeric-instant-concepts)]
let $numeric-instant-concepts := $numeric-concepts[$$ = $numeric-instant-concepts]
let $concepts-not-in-report := $concepts[not $$ = $concepts-in-report]
return
for $facts in facts:facts-for-internal($concepts, $hypercube, $aligned-filter, $concept-maps, $rules, $cache, $options)
group by facts:canonical-grouping-key($facts, ($facts:CONCEPT, $facts:UNIT))
let $template-fact as object := ($facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT = $numeric-concepts], $facts)[1]
let $is-instant := not contains($template-fact.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:PERIOD, "/")
return (
        $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT = $concepts-not-in-report],
        $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT = $non-numeric-concepts],
        
        (: default 0 :)
        let $concepts-with-relevant-period-type := if($is-instant) then $numeric-instant-concepts else $numeric-duration-concepts
        for $concept in $concepts-with-relevant-period-type
        let $fact as object? := $facts[$$.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT eq $concept]
        return switch(true)
          (: fill empty cell with zero :)
          case empty($fact)
          return
            let $audit-trail := {
              "Type" : "xbrl28:default-fact-value",
              "Label" : "Default fact value",
              "Message" : $concept || " = 0",
              "Data" : {
                "OutputConcept" : $concept
              }
            }
            return
            copy $f := $template-fact
            modify (
                replace value of json $f._id with r:uuid(),
                replace value of json $f.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT with $concept,
                replace value of json $f.Value with 0,
                replace value of json $f.Type with "NumericValue",
                if(exists($f.Decimals))
                then replace value of json $f.Decimals with 3
                else insert json { Decimals: 3 } into $f,
                if(exists($f.AuditTrails))
                then replace value of json $f.AuditTrails with [ $audit-trail ]
                else insert json { AuditTrails: [ $audit-trail ] } into $f
            )
            return $f

        (: replacing null with zero :)
        case $fact.Type eq "NumericValue" and $fact.Value eq null
        return
                let $concept := $fact.$facts:ASPECTS.$facts:CONCEPT
                let $audit-trail := {
                    Type: "xbrl28:null-to-zero",
                    Label: "Adapting null value",
                    Message: "Replacing null value with 0.",
                    Data:
                        { OutputConcept: $concept }
                }
                return
                    copy $f := $fact
                    modify (
                        replace value of json $f.Value with 0,
                        if(exists($f.AuditTrails))
                        then append json $audit-trail into $f.AuditTrails
                        else insert json { AuditTrails: [ $audit-trail ] } into $f
                    )
                    return $f

        default return $fact
    )
